mapper.insert: INSERT INTO logstash_process (name, module, config_content, doris_sql, jvm_options, logstash_yml, datasource_id, table_name, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{module}, #{configContent}, #{dorisSql}, #{jvmOptions}, #{logstashYml}, #{datasourceId}, #{tableName}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE logstash_process SET config_content=#{configContent}, jvm_options=#{jvmOptions}, logstash_yml=#{logstashYml}, update_time=NOW() WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT table_name FROM logstash_process WHERE module=#{module}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM logstash_process WHERE module=#{module}
